pages.text: To get started with anything you need to know what you have at your disposal. now you have access to a multitude of new tools including and not limited to Paxels, High Powered Tools, Hammers, etc.
You have access to Hammers. basically 3x3 pickaxe variant that allows the user to carve the underworld in your own image
You have access to Excavators. basically 3x3 shovel variant that allows the user to carve the Surface in your own image
Hookshots allow you to grapple in the direction you fired at. you also have options to further upgrade your hookshot at the smithing table.
